# Roof Replacement – Design Build, Agassiz Research and Development Centre, Agassiz, BC

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-8231-6590556
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: 465-1-22-C26A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-08-17
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-12T13:00:00
* **Last Amendment Date**: 2023-09-12

## Description

This tender solicitation is for a Design Build project to replace the roof of Building 20 at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's Agassiz Research and Development Centre in Agassiz, British Columbia. The current roof was installed in 1996 and has been experiencing leakages for several years, which has caused interior damage to the building.

The proposed new roof shall be a standing seam metal roofing system with a minimum 30-year service life, ensuring leak-free performance. This project involves the removal of the existing roofing and the design, supply, and installation of the new roof.

## Optional Site Visit

An optional site visit is scheduled for August 28, 2023, at 10:00 AM (Local Agassiz Time). Interested bidders are required to meet at the Agassiz Research and Development Centre's main reception area and sign in before assessing the building.

## Contract Requirements

* **Construction Completion Date**: All work must be completed and ready for use by the client on or before March 31, 2024.
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* **Regions of Opportunity**: The project is located in British Columbia, and all work must be performed in this region.
